modules
service in module IAE

Description

Module manager to register modules

Methods

  • addModule(id, title, iconCls)

    Add an app to the program

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    idstring

    The id of the module. Note that there must be a ui.router state for this id as well.

    titlestring

    The title of the module in English.

    iconClsstring

    The class for the icon of FontAwesome. eg. "fa-user" http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/
